present.english: The famous author writes the interesting novel
The experienced journalists write the detailed report

imperfect.english: I was writing the long letter
The famous author was writing the interesting novel
The experienced journalists were writing the detailed report

future.english: I will write the long letter
The famous author will write the interesting novel
The experienced journalists will write the detailed report

aorist.english: The famous author wrote the interesting novel
The experienced journalists wrote the detailed report

optative.english: I should write the long letter

optative.georgian: ცნობილმა ავტორმა საინტერესო რომანი უნდა დაწეროს
optative.english: The famous author should write the interesting novel

optative.georgian: გამოცდილმა ჟურნალისტებმა დეტალური ანგარიში უნდა დაწერონ
optative.english: The experienced journalists should write the detailed report

imperative.english: You all (you formal), write the quick message
